Description: Handle zone sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed with two added white bands; exterior: part of group of vertical strokes to the right of handle (now lost); single brown band below. Graffito on outside.
Curator's comments: The sherd is heavily encrusted with dirt.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0981) (phase 2)
